attributes.comment:
Over the last 12 years everyone witnessed the dramatic increase of immigration
cost, and the dramatic, if not worse, decrease of USCIS efficiency. USCIS has
successfully converted itself from a service, which is supposed to help talented
people join the free world, into a vampire:

A vampire who drains the blood of future immigrants.
A vampire who drains the fresh blood of the freeworld.
A vampire who turns talents back, make them work against the free world.

An increase of the application fee, either to keep up with the inflation rate, or to
boost efficiency, will be well understood, and accepted. The increase under
discussion here is nothing but a clear signal to the future immigrants: GO AWAY!
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
